title: Peanut Butter, Banana, and Oat Milkshake
directions: In a spice grinder, pulverize flax seeds and oats into a fine powder. My spice grinder is just my coffee grinder really well cleaned out.

In a blender combine almond milk, banana, peanut butter, honey, and ground flax and oats. Blend until no banana chunks remain, and the mixture is thoroughly incorporated. Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.
ingredients: 2 cups cold almond milk (soy or regular milk would also be delicious)
1 banana, cut into chunks (frozen is ideal) (definitely peel the bananaâ€¦ like, for sure.)
1 tablespoon flax seeds, ground into meal
2 teaspoon old fashioned oats, ground fine
